I received this as a birthday gift. The phone is very sturdy, and the new Ceramic Shield screen ensures that the phone won’t break or the screen won’t smash if dropped within reasonable distance. It’s also a lovely colour that looks unlike any other iPhone colour before. My only issue would be that the shape makes it hard to find sturdy cases that’ll fit.
The camera quality is fantastic, shoots in 4K and up to 60fps. I’d definitely recommend the pacific blue colour as it’s very futuristic.
Great handset. High quality and very fast.
Very good phone, love it

Best place to buy stuff like iPhones easy and simple checkout.
As you'd expect from Apple this is a quality product with great functionality.

Fast and efficient same day delivery (preferable to other online shops). Phone is great. Upgraded from iPhone X, so slightly bigger screen. The square edges have taken a bit of getting used to, but match my iPad Pro too. Need to get a case to avoid inevitable scratches...

Always been on android but had to change due to compatibility issues with some of my other tech.  This device works flawlessly. Connects to everything without issue. Feels well made and sits in the hand nicely.  
Happy with the change so far.

Everything was amazing from ordering to receiving it the next morning! The phone was brilliant as is usual with Apple but am most impressed with Argos service! Thank you

This model returned to old style Iphone 4-5 with rectangular edges. Overall photo and video quality after my Xiaomi are extraordinary.
Great phone, delivered same day and on time.....excellent.

But once you get used to the there being no home button there’s no problem . Colour is perfect glad I waited for the blue and it’s a lot quicker than my old iPhone . Even though it’s smaller to hold there’s more screen view than my 8 plus which is a bonus. Only downside for me at the moment is the facial recognition. I keep forgetting I have a mask on when trying to use Apple Pay
10/10 to this phone.                  .

Very good phone. I bought it as a gift for my wife and she loves it. It was frustrating to not be able to migrate from her android phone to this iphone and even after paying for third party apps, still could not migrate, This is a big problem. Reason, I would not consider getting myself an iphone.

Was hesitant at first to purchase this phone as it isn’t exactly the cheapest on the market, so glad I did though. It’s by far the best phone I’ve had and do not regret buying it one bit. Purchase was super easy with click and collect through Argos and was even able to pick it up within about an hour of purchasing it. Couldn’t be happier!
Best phone on the market.
What I have used so far on the phone works as well as I expected. The phone seems robust while not being too big or heavy. As usual for Apple it is well made and intuitive to use.
Good and quick service .

Delighted with my new phone, an investment, but well worth it.  Just not having to worry about running out of memory is peace of mind, in the world we live in today when everything is an app.  Easy to use and set up.  Argos was also one of the few places that had them in stock too.

This truely is the best iPhone ever. I’ve had many iPhones over the years and this tops the lot ! Great phone great camera very quick and typical good apple software ! You won’t regret getting this phone !

Happy with the upgrade from my iPhone X, as always there’s a few silly niggles as with all new iPhones. Plenty of features and a great set of cameras but a few things missing compared to android counterparts ie reverse charging...

After deliberating between the 12, 12 Pro and 12 Pro Max, I decided with the balance of the quality of the materials along with the screen type and size, ergonomics, camera quality, battery life and future proofing feature sets, I decided that the 12 Pro would be a good balance and value for money. 

If you have an older model (in my case, the first generation iPhone SE with 32GB), this is a worthy upgrade.
Brilliant phone like you always with Apple. Only downside is, no charging plug in the box and the old USB plug off the previous phone doesn’t fast charge it with the new cable
